sentences.en: But the traffic worries me! I’m not sure about cycling in such heavy traffic.
sentences.cn: 但是交通使我担心！ 在这么拥挤的车辆中骑自行车我不太肯定。

sentences.en: Cycling along the motorway is not allowed.
Cycling enjoyed a vogue at the end of the nineteenth century.
sentences.cn: 19世纪末骑自行车曾风行一时.

sentences.en: Cycling in the fast traffic lane is really dangerous.
sentences.cn: 在快车道上骑自行车,可真悬.

sentences.en: Cycling is good exercise. It strengthens all the muscles of the body.
sentences.cn: 骑自行车是一项不错的锻炼方式。它能使身体各部分的肌肉更强健。

sentences.en: His favourite childhood pursuits were sailing, swimming and cycling.
sentences.cn: 儿时他最大的爱好是帆船运动、游泳和骑自行车。

sentences.en: I suggested a cycling holiday, and he seized on the idea.
sentences.cn: 我提议骑自行车出外度假, 他采纳了这个意见.

sentences.en: Mike had a yen to try cycling.
sentences.cn: 迈克非常想试试骑自行车。

sentences.en: More people would be attracted to cycling if conditions were right.
sentences.cn: 如果天气适宜，会有更多的人被吸引到骑自行车的行列中来。

sentences.en: Recently I've started to do a lot of walking and cycling.
sentences.cn: 最近我开始经常散步和骑自行车。

sentences.en: She was cycling along a country road near Compiegne.
sentences.cn: 她正骑车行进在贡比涅附近的乡村道路上。

sentences.en: She was hot and breathless from the exertion of cycling uphill.
sentences.cn: 她骑车上山累得全身发热，喘不过气来。

sentences.en: She was hot and breathless from the exertion of cycling uphill.
sentences.cn: 由于用力骑车爬坡, 她浑身发热,
骑自行车运动的日益风行

sentences.en: Through the basement window I saw him strap on his pink cycling helmet.
sentences.cn: 透过地下室的窗户，我看到他正在把他那粉色的自行车头盔系在头上。

sentences.en: You might want to consider cycling.
sentences.cn: 你或许可以考虑骑自行车。

words.tran_cn: 循环；周期；自行车；整套；一段时间

phrases.tran_cn: 温度循环试验；循环负荷试验
温度循环；温度周期变化

trans.tran_en: the activity of riding a bicycle
